ViewObject.Name: PoNumLovMassReleaseVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery:
SELECT ph.segment1 FROM po_headers_all ph WHERE EXISTS (SELECT /*+ LEADING(h) */ 'x' FROM ap_supplier_sites_all site, ap_invoices_all ai, (SELECT /*+ INDEX(aph XX_AP_HOLDS_N1) */ distinct aph.invoice_id FROM ap_holds_all aph WHERE aph.creation_date > '01-JAN-11' AND NVL(aph.status_flag,'S')= 'S' AND aph.hold_lookup_code IN ('MAX QTY ORD','QTY ORD','QTY REC','AMT ORD','MAX AMT REC','MAX AMT ORD','AMT REC','OD MAX PRICE','OD Favorable','PRICE','LINE VARIANCE','DIST VARIANCE')
) h WHERE ai.invoice_id=h.invoice_id AND ai.creation_date>'01-JAN-11' AND ai.cancelled_date IS NULL AND NVL(ai.po_header_id,ai.quick_po_header_id)=ph.po_header_id AND EXISTS (SELECT 'x' FROM xx_fin_translatevalues tv ,xx_fin_translatedefinition td WHERE td.TRANSLATION_NAME = 'XX_AP_TR_MATCH_INVOICES' AND tv.TRANSLATE_ID = td.TRANSLATE_ID AND tv.enabled_flag='Y' AND SYSDATE BETWEEN tv.start_date_active and NVL(tv.end_date_active,sysdate) AND tv.target_value1=ai.source ) AND EXISTS (SELECT 'x' FROM mtl_system_items_b msi, po_lines_all pl WHERE pl.po_header_id = NVL(ai.po_header_id,ai.quick_po_header_id) AND msi.inventory_item_id = pl.item_id AND to_char(msi.organization_id) = '441' AND msi.segment1=NVL(NULL,msi.segment1) ) AND site.vendor_site_id=ai.vendor_site_id AND exists (SELECT 'x' FROM xx_fin_translatevalues tv, xx_fin_translatedefinition td WHERE td.translation_name = 'XX_AP_TRADE_CATEGORIES' AND tv.translate_id = td.translate_id AND tv.enabled_flag = 'Y' AND sysdate between tv.start_date_active and nvl(tv.end_date_active,sysdate) AND tv.target_value1 = site.attribute8) )
